name: Substrate is clean, dry and ready to start
Grout fill lifting eyes & panel upstand with Sika Monotop 412
Apply Dryseal 107 over lifting eyes/panel upstand
Installed correctly and as per drawings/specification
Work area is left clean & tidy
Substrate is clean, dry and ready to start
Install expansion tape to horizontal & vertical inaccessible areas
Install PEF backing rod to horizontal & vertical joints
Apply primer to horizontal & vertical joints
Apply sealant to horizontal & vertical joints
Install SS soaker - beadseal with Sikaflex 11 FC & mechanically fixed to one panel
Write initials and date beside each joint
Joint sealant installed correctly and as per drawings/specification
Work area is left clean & tidy
